title: Darkness Of My Mind

description:
it takes a big, strong, burly, awesome man (and NOT a little puppyboy, DON'T EVEN THINK THAT!!!) to admit that he is wrong. well, I was wrong, and I sincerely apologize. I have since learned from my mistakes (impossible G# powerchord slides and stupid 2nd fret palm mutes) and have grown as a person. I hope you can forgive me <3
(via editor)
